formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Windows Azure.

formElement.label: Image URN:
formElement.documentation: The image URN in the form publisherName:offer:skus:version/ The source VHD link of a user image, e.g. https://foo.blob.core.windows.net/system/Microsoft.Compute/Images/vhds/snap-bar.vhd

formElement.label: Is User Image?:
formElement.documentation: Provided URN is of user image or not?

formElement.label: Resource Group Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the resource group in which VM is to be created.

formElement.label: VM User/Password:
formElement.documentation: Credentials for the new virtual machine(resource).

formElement.label: Create Public IP Address?:
formElement.documentation: Create Public IP address for the deployed servers?

formElement.label: Resource Pool:
formElement.documentation: If you would like to add ElectricFlow resources for each Azure instance being created, enter the resource pool name for the new resources. If left blank no resource will be created.

formElement.label: Resource Port:
formElement.documentation: If you specify a resource pool name in 'Resource Pool' field, this is the port that will be used when creating the resource. If no value is specified, port 7800 will be used by default when creating the resource.

formElement.label: Resource workspace:
formElement.documentation: If you specify a resource pool name, this is the workspace that will be assigned to the created resources.

formElement.label: Resource Zone Name:
formElement.documentation: Created resource will belong to the specified zone. Zone 'default' is used by default.

formElement.label: Results Location:
formElement.documentation: Location where the output properties will be saved. If not specified, will default to '/myJob/Azure/deployed'.

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
